plays.text: Penalty to Sergei Samsonov 2 minutes for High-sticking Milan Jurcina
Penalty to Steve Eminger 2 minutes for Holding Scott Walker
Penalty to Alexander Semin 2 minutes for Hooking Scott Walker
Goal scored by Jeff Hamilton (Power Play) assisted by Joe Corvo and Eric Staal
Penalty to Trevor Letowski 2 minutes for Holding Sergei Fedorov
Penalty to Eric Staal 2 minutes for Tripping Nicklas Backstrom
Goal scored by Alexander Semin (Power Play) assisted by Sergei Fedorov and Nicklas Backstrom
Goal scored by Alexander Ovechkin assisted by Nicklas Backstrom and Viktor Kozlov
Penalty to Jeff Schultz 2 minutes for Hooking Tim Gleason
Goal scored by Erik Cole (Power Play) unassisted
Penalty to Alexander Ovechkin 2 minutes for Roughing Tim Gleason
Penalty to Eric Staal 2 minutes for Tripping Shaone Morrisonn
Penalty to Trevor Letowski 2 minutes for Tripping Sergei Fedorov
Penalty to Erik Cole 2 minutes for Hooking Mike Green
Jeff Hamilton shootout attempt against Cristobal Huet with a Snapshot results in a SAVE.
Alexander Ovechkin shootout attempt against Cam Ward with a Snapshot results in a SAVE.
Eric Staal shootout attempt against Cristobal Huet with a Hit Crossbar results in a MISS.
Viktor Kozlov shootout attempt against Cam Ward with a Snapshot results in a GOAL.
